page.title: 03EDUCATION IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: The pre-school{playgroup}meets in the Village Centre on 2 mornings a week and on average 23 children attend. At approx. 5 years the children transfer to Hockwold{Primary}School where they remain until they are 11. Older children travel by coach to{secondary schools in Methwold or Thetford. Some pupils continue their schooling at King's Lynn College of Arts & Tech. Night school classes in a wide range of subjects are held in various{adult education centres within easy travelling distance of Hockwold. Each week the Norfolk County{Library}van visits the village. The Methodist Sunday School meets weekly, 10 children attend. Church Sunday School is held monthly for about 30 children.
